creator: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
Create studio-quality images in seconds. In one tap, remove the background and compose an image that will showcase a product or a model. PhotoRoom gives design super powers to everyone because you edit objects and not pixels.
PhotoRoom is an image editing app that lets you capture, edit, and mix images by editing objects. We use artificial intelligence to automatically cut out the background and overlay your subject over a gorgeous background
With PhotoRoom, you can create:
-product images for e-commerce & marketplaces
-portrait photos and profile pics for business or social networks
-Instagram stories to showcase your store or your activity
-fun collages and stickers

You can also blur the background, erase it, or desaturate it for a color splash of the subject

Terms of Use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/
descriptionShort: Automatically erase background & creates amazing professional images.

appDetails.developerName: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App

title: PhotoRoom - Remove Background & Create Pro Photos

creator: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
No need to be a photography or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your pictures into pro-quality images in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture automatically. In one tap, remove the background and compose a beautiful image that showcases your product or model. Choose a white background, or pick any background you want. Fix lighting, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates. It's like having whole photography and design studio in your pocket!
More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Download PhotoRoom now, it’s free to use.
What you can create:
- Product images for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photos and profile pics for your business or social channels
- Portraits photos for your passport, ID, driving license
- Cover for your youtube cover, Instagram story, Facebook page
- Instagram stories to showcase your store or your activity
- Fun collages and stickers
- You can also blur the background, erase it, or desaturate it for a color splash of the subject.


How to?
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
Pick a picture from your device’s gallery or take a new one straight from the app.
2. Pick a template
Pick a background from one of our 1000+ available templates.
3. Edit pics and add text
Easily add text or images. Apply filters, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Apply your logo
Apply your own logo on the image (for PhotoRoom Pro users)
5. Export your design
Export your awesome image to your Library, or directly Whatsapp, Instagram or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom for Everyone
Photo Editor
- Access the most accurate background eraser: cut out objects in pictures & erase their backgrounds.
- Blur image backgrounds
- Easily crop photos
Sticker Maker: make your own sticker in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
Seasonal Templates: use background templates for every seasonal event (Christmas, Valentine’s Day, and many more)
Photo Collage

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces, you will enjoy features like perfect cute out, export to your marketplaces (Poshmark, vinted, etc), or our batch export mode (in our pro membership). Join our 100K+ community of resellers.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
You will create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out your photo perfectly. Once you are happy with your design, easily export it.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote your business on social media and easily create templates for Youtube covers, Podcast covers, Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest posts.


PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom watermark
- Access to Three Pro Cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to all pro backdrop library including the pro templates
- Higher resolution export
- Start your PhotoRoom Pro membership with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom_app for illustrations and design tips.
Got feedback: hello@photoroom.com


Terms of Use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/
With PhotoRoom, you will enjoy the most accurate background eraser. In a few taps, you will add a white background to your pictures or have access to multiple photo editing options.
descriptionShort: Automatically erase background & create amazing professional images.

creator: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
No need to be a photography or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your pictures into pro-quality images in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture automatically. In one tap, remove the background and compose a beautiful image that showcases your product or model. Choose a white background, or pick any background you want. Fix lighting, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates. It's like having whole photography and design studio in your pocket!
More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Download PhotoRoom now, it’s free to use.
What you can create:
- Product images for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photos and profile pics for your business or social channels
- Portraits photos for your passport, ID, driving license
- Cover for your youtube cover, Instagram story, Facebook page
- Instagram stories to showcase your store or your activity
- Fun collages and stickers
- You can also blur the background, erase it, or desaturate it for a color splash of the subject.


How to?
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
Pick a picture from your device’s gallery or take a new one straight from the app.
2. Pick a template
Pick a background from one of our 1000+ available templates.
3. Edit pics and add text
Easily add text or images. Apply filters, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Apply your logo
Apply your own logo on the image (for PhotoRoom Pro users)
5. Export your design
Export your awesome image to your Library, or directly Whatsapp, Instagram or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom for Everyone
Photo Editor
- Access the most accurate background eraser: cut out objects in pictures & erase their backgrounds.
- Blur image backgrounds
- Easily crop photos
Sticker Maker: make your own sticker in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
Seasonal Templates: use background templates for every seasonal event (Christmas, Valentine’s Day, and many more)
Photo Collage

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces, you will enjoy features like perfect cute out, export to your marketplaces (Poshmark, vinted, etc), or our batch export mode (in our pro membership). Join our 100K+ community of resellers.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
You will create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out your photo perfectly. Once you are happy with your design, easily export it.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote your business on social media and easily create templates for Youtube covers, Podcast covers, Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest posts.


PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom watermark
- Access to Three Pro Cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to all pro backdrop library including the pro templates
- Higher resolution export
- Start your PhotoRoom Pro membership with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom_app for illustrations and design tips.
Got feedback: hello@photoroom.com


Terms of Use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/
With PhotoRoom, you will enjoy the most accurate background eraser. In a few taps, you will add a white background to your pictures or have access to multiple photo editing options.
descriptionShort: Automatically erase background & create amazing professional images.

title: PhotoRoom - Remove Background & Photo Editor

creator: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your pictures into pro-quality images in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture automatically. In one tap, remove the background and compose a beautiful image that showcases your product or model. Choose a white background, or pick any background you want. Fix lighting, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates. It's like having whole photography and design studio in your pocket!
More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Download PhotoRoom now, it’s free to use.
What you can create:
- Product images for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photos and profile pics for your business or social channels
- Portraits photos for your passport, ID, driving license
- Cover for your youtube cover, Instagram story, Facebook page
- Instagram stories to showcase your store or your activity
- Fun collages and stickers
- You can also blur the background, use our background eraser, or desaturate it for a color splash of the subject.


How to?
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
Pick a picture from your device’s gallery or take a new one straight from the app.
2. Pick a template
Pick a background from one of our 1000+ available templates.
3. Photo editing and adding text
Easily add text or images. Apply filters, remove background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Apply your logo
Apply your own logo on the image (for PhotoRoom Pro users)
5. Export your design
Export your awesome image to your Library, or directly Whatsapp, Instagram or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom for Everyone
Photo Editor
- Access the most accurate background eraser: cut out objects in pictures & erase their backgrounds, use a white background or cut background
- Blur image backgrounds
- Easily crop photos
Sticker Maker: make your own sticker in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
Seasonal Templates: use background templates for every seasonal event (Christmas, Valentine’s Day, and many more)
Photo Collage

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces, you will enjoy features like ai background remover,perfect cute out, export to your marketplaces (Poshmark, vinted, etc), or our batch export mode (in our pro membership). Join our 100K+ community of resellers.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
You will create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out your photo perfectly. Once you are happy with your design, easily export it.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote your business on social media and easily create templates for Youtube covers, Podcast covers, Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest posts.


PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom watermark
- Access to Three Pro Cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to all pro backdrop library including the pro templates
- Higher resolution export
- Batch mode
- Start your PhotoRoom Pro membership with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom_app for illustrations and design tips.
Got feedback: hello@photoroom.com


Terms of Use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/

- Portrait photos and profile pics for your business or social channels
- Portraits photos for your passport, ID, driving license

- Instagram stories to showcase your store or your activity
- Fun collages and stickers
- You can also blur the background, use our background eraser, or desaturate it for a color splash of the subject.


How to?
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
Pick a picture from your device’s gallery or take a new one straight from the app.
2. Pick a template
Pick a background from one of our 1000+ available templates.
3. Photo editing and adding text
Easily add text or images. Apply filters, remove background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Apply your logo
Apply your own logo on the image (for PhotoRoom Pro users)

Export your awesome image to your Library, or directly Whatsapp, Instagram or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom for Everyone
Photo Editor

PhotoRoom Pro

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver’s License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself

- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom Pro

- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)

Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver’s License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Make your own stickers in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, etc, you can optimize your business with features like the AI background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode
- Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom for illustrations and design tips.
Send your feedback to hello@photoroom.com
With PhotoRoom, you will enjoy the most accurate background eraser. In a few taps, you will add a white background to your pictures, have a perfect pixelcut, or have access to multiple photo editing options.

Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages.
With our Magic Retouch, now you can remove any unwanted details effortlessly (POOF!) with a swipe of your fingertip,
Editing perfect product shots is a breeze (and dare we say, fun!). We mean it when we say we do visual magic so you can sell faster!

More than 6 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, play with Magic Retouch, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Use Magic Retouch to remove any unwanted objects
- Make your own stickers in a few steps
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop you can optimize your business with features like the background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, magic retouch pictures, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

- Remove the PhotoRoom logo

- Access to Instant Backgrounds - a tool that creates perfect backgrounds for your products using artificial intelligence.

- Edit and export in batch mode

Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial. You'll be charged a subscription fee when the trial ends only, except if you cancel the subscription before. title: PhotoRoom AI Photo Editor

creator: PhotoRoom Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
PhotoRoom is the all-in-one app that edits, designs and optimizes great visual content that helps you run your business from your phone. Remove or erase the background of photos, use templates and create your own content.

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages.
With our Magic Retouch, now you can remove any unwanted details effortlessly (POOF!) with a swipe of your fingertip,
Editing perfect product shots is a breeze (and dare we say, fun!). We mean it when we say we do visual magic so you can sell faster!

More than 6 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, play with Magic Retouch, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Use Magic Retouch to remove any unwanted objects
- Make your own stickers in a few steps
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop you can optimize your business with features like the background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership.

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, magic retouch pictures, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro: you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Access to Instant Backgrounds - a tool that creates perfect backgrounds for your products using artificial intelligence.
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode

Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial. You'll be charged a subscription fee when the trial ends only, except if you cancel the subscription before. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage membership and turn off auto-renew in Google Play account. Free trial is limited to one per Google Play account.

Free Plan is limited to 250 exports.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom for illustrations and design tips.
Send your feedback to hello@photoroom.com

title:
Photoroom AI Photo Editor
4.9.6

creator: PhotoRoom Background Editor App
descriptionHtml:
Create stunning product photos with Photoroom - the secret weapon for e-commerce photography! 🌟

💜 Why over 100 million users love us 💜

- Remove backgrounds with high accuracy in just a few seconds, or try Batch Mode to edit multiple photos faster than ever.
- Create custom backgrounds with Instant Backgrounds, perfectly matching the angle and lighting of your original photo. Choose from manual, assisted, or image prompts to guide our AI, and watch as your vision comes to life effortlessly.
- Clean up your pictures and remove any object, person, or watermark in 3 seconds with our Retouch tool.
- Instantly resize photos for popular social platforms like Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and Pinterest, or for e-commerce marketplaces including Depop, Poshmark, Amazon, and Shopify. Our built-in templates streamline your process, helping you get your product listings live up to 3x faster.
- Enjoy 250 exports monthly in the free plan and unlimited exports in Pro.
- Share and collaborate easily, inviting anyone to view, download, or edit photos.

Featured by Apple and loved by creators everywhere, Photoroom is your go-to for easy, professional photo editing. Enhance your product photos, attract more customers, and see your sales rise. Get started with Photoroom today – it's just a download away. 🚀

About Photoroom Pro subscriptions: Experience the full power of Photoroom Pro with our free trial. Subscribe weekly or yearly, with the freedom to cancel anytime.

- If you enjoy Photoroom Pro and do not cancel before the trial period ends, a subscription fee will be charged.
- Choose between a weekly or yearly subscription. The fee will be billed to your iTunes Account at the end of your free trial.
- Your subscription automatically renews for the chosen period (weekly or yearly) unless you turn off auto-renewal at least 24 hours before the current subscription period ends.
- Expect your iTunes account to be charged for the next subscription period within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- You have complete control over your subscription settings, including cancellation. To modify or cancel your subscription, please visit the Account Settings in iTunes after your purchase.

Terms of Use: https://photoroom.app/legal/terms-and-conditions/

With our Magic Retouch, now you can remove any unwanted details effortlessly (POOF!) with a swipe of your fingertip,
Editing perfect product shots is a breeze (and dare we say, fun!). We mean it when we say we do visual magic so you can sell faster!

More than 6 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download Photoroom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use Photoroom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, play with Magic Retouch, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with Photoroom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc.

Photoroom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Use Magic Retouch to remove any unwanted objects
- Make your own stickers in a few steps
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

Photoroom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop you can optimize your business with features like the background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership.

Photoroom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use Photoroom to remove background, magic retouch pictures, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original Photoroom.

Photoroom for Creators

2025.04.03

creator: Photoroom AI Photo Editor
descriptionHtml:
Create stunning product photos, social media content, and marketing visuals in seconds with Photoroom, the leading AI-powered photo editing app trusted by over 200 million users. Whether you’re an entrepreneur, seller, influencer, or content creator, Photoroom gives you all the tools you need to make your images stand out, grow your brand, and boost sales.

Why choose Photoroom?

🌟 AI that creates visuals for you
No design or AI skills? No problem! Describe your idea, and let our AI create your vision to life instantly. Logos, stickers, custom scenes – whatever you imagine, our AI does it for you in seconds.

🖼️ One-tap background removal & replacement
Remove and replace photo backgrounds effortlessly. Create polished product shots, eye-catching posts, or ad-ready visuals with professional lighting and shadow adjustments with our AI made to enhance product photos.

🔄 Batch editing for maximum efficiency
Save time by editing multiple photos at once. Perfect for high-volume e-commerce sellers or social media campaigns.

📱 Social media & marketplace ready
Resize and optimize images for Instagram, YouTube, Amazon, Shopify, Depop, Poshmark, Etsy, Facebook marketplace and more – no cropping or pixelation!

🎨 Professional templates for every occasion
Choose from designer-made templates for holidays, promotions, and special events. Customize them in just a few taps.

💡 Polish like a pro
Easily remove unwanted objects, clean up images, and retouch photos to perfection with our advanced tools.

🤝 Collaborate with your team
Invite team members to edit, comment, and share designs. Pro accounts include 2 free team access, making collaboration a breeze.

Who Is Photoroom For?
- E-commerce seller creating perfect product listings.
- Content creator building a standout brand.
- Social media manager producing engaging posts.
- Freelancer designing for clients.
- Anyone wanting to create visuals.

Key Features:
- AI-powered background removal and editing
- Create visuals with AI (logos, stickers, scenes)
- Batch mode for high-speed editing
- Photo retouching tools
- Social media and e-commerce AI resize
- Designer templates
- Team collaboration tools
- 250 free exports per month; unlimited with Pro

Why Millions Love Photoroom:
⭐ Easy to use: Simple and powerful AI tools that anyone can master.
⭐ Pro results: Professional results for everyone thanks to AI.

Try Photoroom Pro – Free with our trial on selected plans
Unlock all the advanced tools, premium templates, and unlimited exports with our free trial of Photoroom Pro!

You'll be charged a subscription fee when the trial ends only, except if you cancel the subscription before. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage membership and turn off auto-renew in Google Play account. Free trial is limited to one per Google Play account. Free Plan is limited to 250 exports.

Whether you're running an online store, growing your social presence, or creating amazing content, Photoroom makes it effortless to stand out.

Join over 200 million users and experience the magic of AI-powered photo editing today!
descriptionShort: Automatically erase and cut background & create amazing professional images.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This update brings new features and stability improvements to make your PhotoRoom experience even greater.

- Access Instant Backgrounds and Instant Shadows directly in the Editor 🪄
- You can now create and edit custom Instant Backgrounds! 🧑‍🎨
- Many fixes and improvements under the hood 🏗

Whether you’re an entrepreneur, seller, influencer, or content creator, Photoroom gives you all the tools you need to make your images stand out, grow your brand, and boost sales.

Why choose Photoroom?

🌟 AI that creates visuals for you
No design or AI skills? No problem! Describe your idea, and let our AI create your vision to life instantly. Logos, stickers, custom scenes – whatever you imagine, our AI does it for you in seconds.

🖼️ One-tap background removal & replacement
Remove and replace photo backgrounds effortlessly. Create polished product shots, eye-catching posts, or ad-ready visuals with professional lighting and shadow adjustments with our AI made to enhance product photos.

🔄 Batch editing for maximum efficiency
Save time by editing multiple photos at once. Perfect for high-volume e-commerce sellers or social media campaigns.

📱 Social media & marketplace ready
Resize and optimize images for Instagram, YouTube, Amazon, Shopify, Depop, Poshmark, Etsy, Facebook marketplace and more – no cropping or pixelation!

🎨 Professional templates for every occasion
Choose from designer-made templates for holidays, promotions, and special events. Customize them in just a few taps.

💡 Polish like a pro
Easily remove unwanted objects, clean up images, and retouch photos to perfection with our advanced tools.

🤝 Collaborate with your team
Invite team members to edit, comment, and share designs. Pro accounts include 2 free team access, making collaboration a breeze.

Who Is Photoroom For?
- E-commerce seller creating perfect product listings.
- Content creator building a standout brand.
- Social media manager producing engaging posts.
- Freelancer designing for clients.
- Anyone wanting to create visuals.

Key Features:
- AI-powered background removal and editing
- Create visuals with AI (logos, stickers, scenes)
- Batch mode for high-speed editing
- Photo retouching tools
- Social media and e-commerce AI resize
- Designer templates
- Team collaboration tools
- 250 free exports per month; unlimited with Pro

Why Millions Love Photoroom:
⭐ Easy to use: Simple and powerful AI tools that anyone can master.
⭐ Pro results: Professional results for everyone thanks to AI.

Try Photoroom Pro – Free with our trial on selected plans
Unlock all the advanced tools, premium templates, and unlimited exports with our free trial of Photoroom Pro!

You'll be charged a subscription fee when the trial ends only, except if you cancel the subscription before. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage membership and turn off auto-renew in Google Play account. Free trial is limited to one per Google Play account. Free Plan is limited to 250 exports.

Whether you're running an online store, growing your social presence, or creating amazing content, Photoroom makes it effortless to stand out.

Join over 200 million users and experience the magic of AI-powered photo editing today!
descriptionShort: Automatically erase and cut background & create amazing professional images.

- You can now create and edit custom Instant Backgrounds! 🧑‍🎨
- Many fixes and improvements under the hood 🏗

Why choose Photoroom?

🌟 AI that creates visuals for you
No design or AI skills? No problem! Describe your idea, and let our AI create your vision to life instantly. Logos, stickers, custom scenes – whatever you imagine, our AI does it for you in seconds.

🖼️ One-tap background removal & replacement
Remove and replace photo backgrounds effortlessly. Create polished product shots, eye-catching posts, or ad-ready visuals with professional lighting and shadow adjustments with our AI made to enhance product photos.

🔄 Batch editing for maximum efficiency
Save time by editing multiple photos at once. Perfect for high-volume e-commerce sellers or social media campaigns.

📱 Social media & marketplace ready
Resize and optimize images for Instagram, YouTube, Amazon, Shopify, Depop, Poshmark, Etsy, Facebook marketplace and more – no cropping or pixelation!

🎨 Professional templates for every occasion
Choose from designer-made templates for holidays, promotions, and special events. Customize them in just a few taps.

💡 Polish like a pro
Easily remove unwanted objects, clean up images, and retouch photos to perfection with our advanced tools.

🤝 Collaborate with your team
Invite team members to edit, comment, and share designs. Pro accounts include 2 free team access, making collaboration a breeze.

Who Is Photoroom For?
- E-commerce seller creating perfect product listings.
- Content creator building a standout brand.

- Freelancer designing for clients.
- Anyone wanting to create visuals.

- Photo retouching tools

- Designer templates
- Team collaboration tools
- 250 free exports per month; unlimited with Pro
